78764.summary: Some customers in the Sunridge area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
78764.title: June 19 - Calgary (Sunridge) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
